quotes: In April 2016 then Labour MP for Bolsover, Dennis Skinner was reprimanded by House Speaker John Bercow for referring to Cameron as 'Dodgy Dave'
In July 2016, Skinner once again referred to Cameron as 'Dodgy Dave' in parliament, however this time he was not reprimanded, or asked to leave.
Speaking at a Conservative reception in 2008, As leader of the Conservative Party, Cameron was accused of relying on 'old-boy networks'
Following poor results in the May 2012 local elections after a difficult few months for the government, with Labour increasing its lead
